setTree

public void setTree(Node newRoot)
Replace the entire tree, recalculating cached values

Parameters:
newRoot - the Node object that is the root of the new tree

setScaleFactor

public void setScaleFactor(double xvalue,
                           double yvalue,
                           double x,
                           double y)
Rescales the tree, keeping the point (x, y) in screen coords at the same position relative to the tree. Note that rescaling the tree only has an effect on the vertical scale.

Parameters:
value - the new scale value
x - the x position to keep the same while the tree is scaled
y - the y position to keep the same while the tree is scaled

findNode

public Node findNode(double x,
                     double y)
Calls findNode(Node,double,double,double) on the root of the tree

Parameters:
x - the x-value to search for the node at
y - the y-value to search for the node at
See Also:
findNode(Node,double,double,double)

setYOffsets

public void setYOffsets(Node node,
                        double _prev)
Sets the y-offset for each node in the tree to the average of its children

Parameters:
node - the root of the tree to set y-offsets for
_prev - an internal variable for recusion
